data.text:
What's happening this week at the UN? #CSW61, #HappinessDay, #WorldWaterDay + more. 

Full list of events is here: https://t.co/HDzhfjjC8u https://t.co/nujjxNSkJZ

Check out this weekend's UN #SmallSmurfsBigGoals #HappinessDay event.

The #GlobalGoals are for people & the planet!
https://t.co/HGMu1APVMU
Watch Special Envoy for @Refugees Angelina Jolie's tribute to hardworking aid workers https://t.co/AK9Gxvulik  https://t.co/uZj3yoGNLA

Monday is #HappinessDay! 

The #GlobalGoals are 17 ways to make the world a happier place. See: https://t.co/ZqvTqzT4RX #SmallSmurfsBigGoals https://t.co/cLb0r8xQrJ
Zambia’s youngest mayor says: "This is the right time for young people to get involved in politics" https://t.co/ma0LgyLSSB #InvestInYouth https://t.co/VywXxPmwhC
Most hungry people live in places prone to disasters; climate change makes it worse. @WFP & @Oxfam on  #r4resilience https://t.co/hf1m7J4RX9
Every donation to @WFP provides more nutritious food for hungry children & families. https://t.co/KAMwoU1Hvb https://t.co/WwKTGeNZqB
.@UNPOL works to restore & promote public safety. Here's one video update from South Sudan. https://t.co/UaV6C1yOlf https://t.co/F5xiVa9VB9
Migrants play a vital role in the global economy. Get their real stories here:  https://t.co/wJ6S3duqhA #JoinTogether #UN4RefugeesMigrants https://t.co/nmc7pXqUWK

⚡️ #SmallSmurfsBigGoals stars promoted the #GlobalGoals at the the UN Saturday. Check out the "blue carpet!"

https://t.co/HGMu1APVMU
Call for proposals now open: photographs of journalists working in sensitive situations. @UNESCO info is here: https://t.co/IRWsvMDESq https://t.co/vZkuemd1vv
Syria: 13.5 million need assistance; 6.3 million are displaced internally. Thank you to these host countries: https://t.co/xn2HItIw0u https://t.co/qxeeFzohLB
Each & every one of us can make a difference for the #GlobalGoals, regardless of our size. Watch & share this #SmallSmurfsBigGoals video. https://t.co/PTLCXd9CSs
How do emergency responders reach people after disasters? @UNDP partner @what3words explains one use of #Tech4Good. https://t.co/aFbARoTbqy

How can societies change work for the better? 
Join new @ILO dialogue on the future of work: https://t.co/9cgV4ruWHZ https://t.co/wZO9mSbVZM
Equal pay now! Thanks to @AbbyWambach & @PattyArquette for leading the call at the UN this week https://t.co/TkgHcocuY6 #stoptherobbery https://t.co/yt0y6Zv3tk
The wage gap is unfair. Raise your voice for equal pay at https://t.co/rPcHXiERo7 - @UN_women #stoptherobbery https://t.co/5ZCzf7oQXa
Smurfs are small, but they signed on to support very big #GlobalGoals. "Blue carpet" #smallsmurfsbiggoals interview: https://t.co/SK7TLG57BY https://t.co/sjOWI48ny9
Live from NYC! @ddlovato, @JoeManganiello, @PatinkinMandy + more celebrate #SmallSmurfsBigGoals at the UN. See: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/xEbk8p9gna
Children are key to the #GlobalGoals. See the full #smallsmurfsbiggoals livestream here: https://t.co/SK7TLG57BY https://t.co/pFRhd6TTim

Go behind the scenes at today's #smallsmurfsbiggoals event to celebrate the @GlobalGoalsUN + #happinessday!

@Snapchat: united-nations https://t.co/1utB4Hmpov
.@UNCDF is the UN’s capital investment agency for the world’s 48 least developed countries. Info here: https://t.co/EMOO3LLNQm https://t.co/u2nOPl51RQ

.@UNOCHA says situation in Yemen is dire. Watch the story of just one family there in this new video.

You can help: https://t.co/6W8T0yyo5Y https://t.co/RNFQ8rlZof
Despite obstacles, @WHO continues to provide medicines & supplies, training for remaining health staff + medical teams & mobile clinics https://t.co/MHnh2uzHd3
Challenge gender bias & stereotypes in media with the @UNESCO #WomenMaketheNews campaign - take the checkup here: https://t.co/Ibd4dgEiup https://t.co/9gusncTZvb
Stay tuned! We are welcoming #SmallSmurfsBigGoals stars to the UN in NYC on Saturday to celebrate the #GlobalGoals  https://t.co/9leUIZBBHP https://t.co/59dfGgFC1v
Reducing disaster risk & losses in lives, livelihoods and health are key to the #globalgoals – @RobertGlasserUN on the #switch2sendai https://t.co/lY4Eh4rMMq
Video look back at the wk: #CSW61 calls for equality, #SyriaCrisis enters 7th year + more. https://t.co/PmbMhltxws https://t.co/PPEjwHvVV9
The #SmallSmurfsBigGoals site show how the #GlobalGoals are working for everyone everywhere https://t.co/ZqvTqzBu0p  https://t.co/ziaJw92x7j
20 yrs ago today: @ctbto_alerts established–8 ratifications needed for #CTBT entry into force  https://t.co/o2oijAES4I #FinishWhatWeStarted https://t.co/7PzHAfdqGL
Stop the smuggling. @UNICEF on everyone to stand with #ChildrenUprooted: https://t.co/8NGoHWMhcs #jointogether https://t.co/Gxo0y72HWk
1.6 million people have fled violence & hunger in #SouthSudan. Update from @refugees here: https://t.co/GCPo8wfIWk https://t.co/GdfSHXxVI1
6 years on, 13.5 million people in Syria need assistance and 85% are living in poverty - @OCHA_Syria https://t.co/eIvI1pkdSs #SyriaCrisis https://t.co/sz1hN1Reww
This week @PattyArquette talked to @UN_Radio about the new @UN_Women "equal pay for equal work" campaign https://t.co/8bP0TeVbwU https://t.co/86hED5lV3V
The Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction is 2 years old. Join @UNISDR at #MEXICOGP2017  https://t.co/IoUn0xguur #switch2sendai
One of many innovation projects showcased at #AfricaShares this wk - @Refugees https://t.co/0GHyrUiZL6 https://t.co/ASSEgm7HlZ
Share your story! Be a part of the UN's #JoinTogether initiative. Here is how: https://t.co/oRGj9rqAv5 https://t.co/MfPAAGBVpM

.@UNFPAIraq is providing frontline emergency response to families fleeing west Mosul  - https://t.co/dJ3B1js4Dv 
#MosulAid https://t.co/aLZQ2ewRY4
Somalia: @WHO, @UNICEF & @Gavi are helping govt respond to large-scale cholera outbreak; 268 deaths reported in 2017 https://t.co/s0TpAe3K5v
All women need access to education, training, skills, so they can participate in digital economy - @UN_Women https://t.co/lwM0H3V12K  #CSW61 https://t.co/8a2QhPs5dS
.@AntonioGuterres is committed to reforming the UN & to ensuring it delivers results in the most efficient & cost-effective manner. https://t.co/mNyaxDC33t
New group to work on UN approach to sustained effective global action to address #AntimicrobialResistance - @WHO https://t.co/Xy6bcmisuS https://t.co/KBBsCqnHea
What to know what you can do to help save lives in countries #FacingFamine? @WFP has info here: https://t.co/TmlYMojJ0o https://t.co/CwjAl1WCFB
Leading women mayors pledge to support climate action & deliver #ParisAgreement https://t.co/81Gv6z4ofN #Women4Climate via @UNFCCC https://t.co/E6xbnCmSkY
Global challenges can only be addressed by a strong & effective multilateral system, including UN - @UN_Spokesperson https://t.co/1byFBX9sbP https://t.co/S6S1MvdJyM
See how @UNmigration is providing shelter to families displaced by #BokoHaram in NE Nigeria. https://t.co/jvdsqhbpx8 https://t.co/8LPNACot94
This new @GlobalCompact #WEPs #GenderGap Tool is working accelerate pace towards pay parity https://t.co/Q61c02SChg https://t.co/FsH4MPeJvp
Empowerment of indigenous women is a focus area at 61st Commission on the Status of Women. https://t.co/qM7VpViBz2 #CSW61 #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/7nrDKb3Rxy
News: top 5 international trademark applicants last year - see more facts and figures from @WIPO here:  https://t.co/vM3hnPRnno https://t.co/E7Oa0jl0Sv
Millions of @refugees are struggling with their education. This #africashares innovation helps kids stay in school: https://t.co/Dn22uXsftP https://t.co/NHrY8DSfxH
2017 #WomeninPolitics map from @UN_Women & @IPUparliament shows women’s representation stagnating: https://t.co/MREY41FbN8  #CSW61 https://t.co/yX8aTDHb5R
Yemen needs urgent assistance to prevent famine: severe food insecurity threatens more than 17mln ppl - @FAOnews https://t.co/QZ8JFYpoOH https://t.co/irQR0IFopE

Providing emergency help to those forced to flee saves lives. 

See more facts on @refugees: https://t.co/VgCaqqwsn2 https://t.co/V3WaylOnX1
.@UN_Women's  @phumzileunwomen says gender parity in politics remains uneven & patchy #csw61 https://t.co/dmRcSr5GxP https://t.co/AldMvOcs5H

#foreverychild, peace.

#ChildrenUnderAttack on a daily basis as war in Syria reaches 6 yrs https://t.co/I7srnPSCUG https://t.co/NSmrURMIuO
UNHCR is now LIVE on Facebook with Special Envoy Angelina Jolie, @RefugeesChief + @BBClysedoucet. Watch here: https://t.co/WwXdudr442 https://t.co/vPhxnSUAfU

UN staff in NYC gathered to stand in solidarity with the people of Syria. 

One way to help is to support @UNICEF: https://t.co/towKYYyR28 https://t.co/4OsDopa9hU
.@AntonioGuterres calls on Security Council members to come together to work to end human trafficking https://t.co/LQp1L677sM https://t.co/bD6WjW73zV
As Commission on the Status of Women continues this week, @UNFPA profiles 4 activists you need to know: https://t.co/KcBCJ0jeaj #CSW61 https://t.co/dn0DlbqhkL
Leave no one behind: take a look at the new @UNHLP Women's Economic Empowerment report now online here: https://t.co/ahA8omnIom  #CSW61
See the impact of 6 years of war on children – @UNICEF is working to help #ChildrenUnderAttack in Syria https://t.co/pjUuCOb12Y
"Discrimination against women sounds a loud alarm that our common values are under threat." https://t.co/rPcHXiERo7 #stoptherobbery https://t.co/KxgJbKGLIm

You an help. Each and every contribution @WFP receives is immediately put to work. https://t.co/WeHlNF1DYN https://t.co/khbAtICfky

As Syria conflict enters 7th year, @UNHumanRights chief calls it "a place of savage horror & absolute injustice" https://t.co/X6aQbbws2h
